task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 250°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the top of the building to estimate its full height, so I will look up.

I can now see the top of the building, and combining this view with the previous one, I can count approximately 10 floors; assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 to 4 meters including the taller ground floor, I estimate the total height to be around 38 meters.
